gcci.text: H100 pricing at $3.13/hour reflects constrained supply from export controls and limited foundry capacity, driving a 23% surge in capex for alternative accelerators as enterprises hedge against geopolitical chip bottlenecks.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's $1.33/1M input token pricing signals intensifying API price compression amid model commoditization, forcing competitors to either achieve superior efficiency or face consolidation pressures in the crowded inference market.

gagl.text: 120 TWh annual AI energy load represents a critical grid strain point, accelerating nuclear power revival discussions as data centers seek baseload reliability while reducing their 0.3 kg CO2/kWh carbon footprint to meet ESG mandates.

aipi.text: Converging pressures from chip scarcity, token pricing deflation, and energy constraints suggest the AI bubble may burst within 18 months unless breakthrough efficiency gains offset unsustainable cost structures across the entire value chain.
